#summary Notes concerning the implementation of the automatic scaling engine
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

The automatic scaling is implemented using the algorithm proposed by W.J. Dixon and R.A. Kronmal (University of California, Los Angeles) in their publication _The Choice of Origin and Scale for Graphs_ (1965). It improves on ideas formulated by T. Giammo (Space Technolog Laboratories, Inc., Redondo Beach, California) in his publication _A Mathematical Method for the Automatic Scaling of a Function_ (1964). Hence the phrase _using space technology_ on the project homepage.
